welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Qana, Lebanon! This charming city is known for its rich history and captivating beauty. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Qana has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kiryat Shmona Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kiryat Shmona Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rosh Pina Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rosh Pina Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Masada Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
